title: Zoom meeting link for counselling yet not received

comments.body: i paid 5.1 lakh and filled up the google form on 30th may but didn't receive a confirmation mail  and still have not received a zoom meeting link. i sent out a mail to pesu admission email account 2 days ago but no reply, i tried calling them just now but they dont pickup calls outside of work hours .
I was told the link will come till evening 5 pm today when I called at 2 but now even the office hours are over and they arenâ€™t picking the phone
I got the zoom link just now
